intro: Bleekeria coccinea, commonly known as the red-flowered bleekeria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly known as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and vibrant red flowers that bloom in summer. It thrives in well-drained sandy soils and full sun exposure. Due to its ornamental value, it is often cultivated in gardens and rockeries.
